content:
I described here a class of categories that I am currently studying.
[Mod] Morgan Rogers said:

It's a class which I don't have a good name for, which I'm provisionally calling pre-regular, although that is a Bad Name since is already something by that name in the literature, and the link to regular categories is rather weak.

This seems like as good a place as any to ask if anyone has an inspired idea for a name for this class of categories, pending me finding such a name by myself :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
This topic was moved here from #practice: applied ct > name my categories! by [Mod] Morgan Rogers
It's possible that once you work out the internal logic, a name will present itself based on the capabilities of the logic.
